GHS and GMS Synchronous Learner Procedures

To gain access to your classes, log into your school issued chromebook.
1. Open up the chrome browser.
2. Log into Clever (should be a GISD bookmark).
3. Look for Schoology Icon - Click. From here you should see your course list and schedule.

5. Close out of the 1st period Google meeting.
6. Select your 2nd period course in Schoology.
7. Select the live link to join this new Google meets class.
8. Continue the same process throughout the day.

The Goliad ISD Board of Trustees has employed Texas Association of School Boards (TASB) Executive Search Services to assist with the search for a new superintendent. The Board has requested that school personnel and the public be involved in developing the qualifications and characteristics of the person the Board should seek to become the new superintendent.

Community involvement meetings will be held Thursday, September 3, 2015. The TASB search consultant will facilitate discussions with community and staff members.
